Our Process

Professional RTU Replacement Process

We handle everything from assessment to commissioning, ensuring minimal disruption to your business operations.

1

Rooftop Assessment

Free evaluation of existing units

2

Equipment Sizing

Load calculations & efficiency analysis

3

Crane Coordination

Schedule equipment removal/placement

4

Installation

Professional installation with curb adapters

5

Commissioning

System startup and verification

6

Documentation

Warranty registration & training

What's Included

  • Complete removal of old unit
  • Crane service & rigging
  • Curb adapter if needed
  • Electrical & gas connections
  • Control system integration
  • Startup & commissioning
  • 10-year parts warranty
  • 2-year labor warranty
